welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Halewood, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and offers a more streamlined experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Manchester Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic and European flights at Manchester Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, used for select long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Warton Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
